text: Destroyer is the fourth studio album and fifth album overall by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on March 15, 1976. == Track listing == * "Detroit Rock City" * "King Of The Night Time World" * "God Of Thunder" * "Great Expectations" * "Flaming Youth" * "Sweet Pain" * "Shout It Out Loud" * "Beth" * "Do You Love Me" Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1976 albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Destroyer (album)
